attributes.action: Scrap Prescription Charges for People suffering from Rheumatoid Arthritis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, other chronic diseases, such as diabetes, are eligible for free precriptions. Rheumatoid Arthritis is chronic too, requiring life-long and, often numerous, mediations. I am 36 years old and currently have 5x medications treating my condition. Apart from having to suffer this debilitating and painful disease, why do I also have to suffer financially? I am still working (with difficulty but dignity) and paying taxes. There are currently over 360,000 people in the UK with the same fate. Help us!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap Prescription Charges for People suffering from Rheumatoid Arthritis."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17604


Prime Minister's Office
